title: PM condoles demise of Kamal Azfar
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Monday expressed grief and sorrow over the death of former governor Sindh Kamal Azfar and condoled with the bereaved family.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for the elevation of soul of Kamal Azfar and for grant of patience to his family.
He said the demise of Kamal Azfar has deprived Pakistan of a wise and good politician.
